items.q: What is the maximum weight class permitted for a boxer competing in the Heavyweight division?
items.explanation: In the Heavyweight division, there is an established minimum weight but remarkably no upper weight limit mathematically.

items.q: In Australian Rules Football, passing the ball forward with your hands is strictly prohibited.
items.explanation: Players must deliberately punch or 'handpass' the ball; simply throwing it is definitively a foul.

items.q: The game of water polo is contested with exactly five players on each side in the water at one time.
items.explanation: Each team specifically fields seven players simultaneously (six field players and one designated goalkeeper).

items.q: What exceptionally grueling multi-sport race consists sequentially of swimming, cycling, and running?
items.explanation: The famed 'Ironman' is one of the most famously demanding distance triathlons globally.

items.q: In soccer (association football), what does the 'offside' rule generally prevent?
items.a: It strictly prevents offensive players from lingering behind the last defender (other than the goalkeeper) near the opposing goal waiting for a deep pass.
items.explanation: A player is fundamentally penalized if they are offside when the ball is actively played to them by a teammate.

items.q: Which sport uses fundamentally colored belts systematically to visually denote a practitioner's active rank and skill level?
items.explanation: The distinct progression traditionally starts unequivocally with a white belt and culminates with a black belt structurally.

items.q: What effectively is a 'perfect game' defensively in Major League Baseball?
items.a: A game perfectly pitched by one or more pitchers securely where absolutely no opposing batter safely reaches base mathematically during the entire game.
items.explanation: It strictly requires exactly 27 up and 27 down with no hits, walks, or defensive errors.

items.q: In basketball officially, how many personal fouls completely disqualifies a player securely from an NBA game?
items.explanation: In officially sanctioned international (FIBA) or strictly American college basketball, carefully checking out requires five cleanly.
